CHAT.comment: GENERAL DYNAMICS CORPORATION, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GENERAL NEAL KUMAR KATYAL ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT
(Whereupon, at 11:02 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
